github.copilot.chat.agent.repeatPrompt: Analyze ALL code for logical bugs and fix them immediately. Check: logic errors, state management, data flow, async operations, error handling, edge cases, performance issues. Work methodically through every code file, one at a time and systematically. Take your time. Continue iterating until completely bug-free. Fix, don't just report.
